display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (all apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal + hypopneas with > 30% airflow reduction and with > 4% desaturation or with arousal) / hour of sleep
calculation: 60 * (hremba4 + hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 + urbpa4 + uropa4 + unrbpa4 + unropa4 + carbp + carop + canbp + canop + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop  / slptimetotal
